channel.title: Camelot : City Construction
channel.description:
Camelot is a new city that is uprising. It will have a bank, mill, 2 farms, space for 10 moderate sized homes, surrounded by stone walls, and of course a city hall.
There are custom rent plans you can pay to live in Camelot. All rent plans are splitted equally between the three founders (me, Vain, and Matthew). These rent payments fund the expansion of the city, and are expected to be paid.
Some of these city coverages include:
[ul][*]Snowfall collection, snow balls are deposited for anyone to use. [*]Tree trims and free sapplings, deposited for anyone to use. [*]Bakery chest, which holds food when needed. [*]Use to our city farm, please replant seeds. [*]Protection against all mobs, city is enclosed. [*]Free-to-use tree farm. [*]Your own personal bank, only accessable by me, Vain, Matthew, and yourself. [*]Huge underground mine shaft, all resources can be mined by town members. [*]Obsidian lava insinerator for anyone's use. [*]Free town-collected resources. A chest only accessable by town members. Town members should deposit worthy unused resources to this chest. [*]Camelot tower in the centre of town, which is a wonderful sight, lights up the town at night. [*]Electrical wiring services. [*]Minecart traveling, with free-to-use carts [*]Boat dock, with free-to-use boats[/ul]
Looking to join Camelot? All members of the city must agree to the City Laws, and be approved.
[b]City Laws[/b]
[ul][*]Don't be selfish in the city-deposit. Take supplies you need only, do not take supplies just to store in your own chest. [*]DO NOT GRIEF. If anyone notices you griefing and proves it, not only will you be kicked from the city, you will be BANNED ON THE SERVER. [*]Do not waste resources at the insinerator. It's purpose is to rid of non-useful items. NEVER insinerate bank-deposit items. [*]Replant seeds after collecting grain. If you don't need the grain, put in the city deposit. [*]You should return borrowed items. Boats and minecarts[/ul]

item.title: Camelot : City Construction
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:12, topic:377849”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=473734.msg3467513#msg3467513 date=1295045155]

Well, I was walking through the woods today and I noticed this :
http://img64.imageshack.us/img64/6475/camelotsadface.png

I don’t know who it was, but it wasn’t me :\

everything will be restored mitb himself burnt down varrock rules r gone atm

Ah, I did not notice the new sticky. Well then, I am off to torch the spawn…
[/quote]

already a crater lol[/quote]
Oh… well then…

Read full topic
